results.text: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.
results.reason: Encourages believers to bring their worries to God in prayer.
results.reflection: Trust in God's ability to handle our anxieties and surrender them to Him in prayer.

results.text: Therefore do not worry about tomorrow, for tomorrow will worry about itself. Each day has enough trouble of its own.
results.reason: Reminds us to focus on the present moment and trust God for the future.
results.reflection: God's grace is sufficient for each day, so we can trust Him with our future.

results.text: Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.
results.reason: Emphasizes God's care and concern for His children's worries.
results.reflection: God's love for us motivates us to release our anxieties and burdens to Him.

results.text: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
results.reason: Assures believers of God's presence, strength, and support in times of anxiety.
results.reflection: God's constant presence and assistance provide us with the courage to face our fears.

results.text: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.
results.reason: Encourages surrendering worries to God and relying on His faithfulness.
results.reflection: Trusting in God's faithfulness enables us to find stability and peace in the midst of anxiety.
